qualityImageSpecNotMet.text: Quality - Image does not meet spec
qualityImageSpecNotMet.value: Quality - Image Does Not Meet Spec

publishedToS7ByUser.fieldDescription: This attribute will capture the User name and/or ID of the User, who published the asset by running project cleanup workflow or quick publish to Scene 7 in Ecommerce folder only.
publishedToS7ByUser.name: ./jcr:content/reportingmetadata/publishedToS7ByUser

rejectedBy.fieldDescription: This attribute will capture the User name or ID of the User, who rejected the asset by selecting ‘Asset Rejection Reason’ and clicking on ‘Save & Close’
rejectedBy.name: ./jcr:content/reportingmetadata/rejectedBy

ecommEntryDate.fieldDescription: This attribute will capture the date asset moved to Ecommerce folder from Vendor Assets Holding folder.
ecommEntryDate.name: ./jcr:content/reportingmetadata/ecommEntryDate

contentOpsReviewedDate.fieldDescription: This attribute will capture the date when having Content Ops have reviewed the asset by Content Ops Reviewed = Yes.
contentOpsReviewedDate.name: ./jcr:content/reportingmetadata/contentOpsReviewedDate

retoucherMove.fieldDescription: This attribute will capture the User name and/or ID of the User who used the ‘move’ functionality to move the asset manually to Retoucher folder in Ecommerce folder only.
retoucherMove.name: ./jcr:content/reportingmetadata/lastModifiedByUser

rejectedDate.fieldDescription: This attribute will capture the date asset was rejected by the User and moved to the rejection folder.
rejectedDate.name: ./jcr:content/reportingmetadata/rejectedDate

vahEntryDate.fieldDescription: This attribute will capture the date asset moved from Vendor Portal to VAH folder
vahEntryDate.name: ./jcr:content/reportingmetadata/vahEntryDate

imageSetCreatedBy.fieldDescription: This attribute will capture the User name or ID of the User, who created the imageSet on clicking on ‘Save & Close’
imageSetCreatedBy.name: ./jcr:content/reportingmetadata/imageSetCreatedBy

imagesetNightlyPublishDate.fieldDescription: This attribute will capture the date on which 'Image Set Nightly Publish' parameter in 'BBBYAssetMetadata' Tab is set to yes by the user. This attribute is only captured for imagesets in ecomm folder.
imagesetNightlyPublishDate.name: ./jcr:content/reportingmetadata/imagesetNightlyPublishDate
